remarks: Alternate strong form of the Axiom of Regularity.  Not every element of a nonempty class contains some element of that class.  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 24-Oct-2011.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 27-Sep-2013.)
statement:

$d A x y $.
